ISSUE.TITLE: Test case fail when have multiple theme in store
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: Add new theme in store Run test case it'll fail test case `CanPrepareStoreThemeSelectorModel` because it checking theme should be 1 it must be `model.AvailableStoreThemes.Count.Should().BeGreaterThan(1);` https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/5f022f5570d4c8f7f268a5c0f34b6cd4f3a4d889/src/Tests/Nop.Tests/Nop.Web.Tests/Public/Factories/CommonModelFactoryTests.cs#L274 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13154058/108333486-ffa79b80-71f6-11eb-8b7e-28d824ef62e2.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5144 Added success notification after notifying a recipient about a gift card

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5343 Fixed test case when have multiple theme in store
